appsectionnft.title: Trade without platform fees on Artion
appsectionnft.text: Artion is an NFT marketplace built on Fantom. Create and trade NFTs instantly with low network costs.

card1.title: Easy Connect
card1.text: Using Metamask or CoinBase Wallet. Just click 'Connect Wallet' on the top right to start.

card2.title: Super Fast
card2.text: Since Artion runs on the Fantom Opera Network, transactions are usually confirmed within 1-2 seconds.

card3.title: Low Transaction Fees
card3.text: Transactions are usually just a few cents, allowing users to create and trade many NFTs without prohibitively high network fees.

card4.title: Zero Platform Fees
card4.text: Trade NFTs via auction or direct offer without any fees taken by Artion.
